name: Research Quality Guidelines
description: Ensures thorough research with proper citations and credible sources
guidance:
**Research Quality Guidelines:**
- Cite at least 3 credible sources when making factual claims
- Include publication dates for time-sensitive information
- Distinguish between primary and secondary sources
- Cross-reference facts across multiple sources
- Provide context for statistical claims
- Use authoritative sources (academic journals, government data, established news outlets)
